title: VIDEO: Riding Fixed, Up Mountains, with Pros featuring Lael Wilcox
content:
The Lael Wilcox edition of State Bicycles’ Riding Fixed, Up Mountains, With Pros series starts like this: Interviewer: “Do you ever want to learn how to drive a car?” Lael Wilcox: “No.” That preference may surprise some, but not many. Wilcox started biking at age 20 as an urban transportation upgrade over walking. 13 years

author: Sam Anderson
